attributes.action: prohibit the MoD from sending multiple members of the same family to hostile areas at the same time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC reports that the husband and 3 sons of Mrs Wendy Mackness are to serve in Iraq at the same time.  Whilst they would not themselves ask for favour, it is unreasonable and unnecessary to put families under such terrible strain.  These men's tours of duty should be staggered to ensure that no more than 2 were away at any one time.
